name: Transmosis
description:
Transmosis

A relaxing, ambient game where you float around absorbing cells to become the biggest. 3D adaptation inspired by the 2D game "osmos", with some unique twists.

Created by LMGNStudios.com for the Spring 2018 #ue4jam

All content created during the Gamejam timeframe, including music.

Known issue: Sometimes it will suggest you restart the level when it's still possible (although maybe difficult) to complete it.

Game Name: Transmosis

Team Name: LMGNStudios
